column4: Hello. hoary seems to have disabled direct editing of gnome menus.  Has anyone else noticed this?  Also several of gnome's special URI locations are inaccesible, e.g. 'applications:///'.
aplications:/// was actually removed from gnome 2.10 it self
there are instructions on ubuntu website on how to install gnome menu editor
Agrajag: It's a shame Gnome didn't also change their documentation too.
well you can always jump in and help if you have time, documentation guys are always looking for help
